text: Sunny (born Susan Soonkyu Lee on May 15, 1989) is an American singer based in South Korea. She is also a radio DJ, music show host, and member of the Korean girl group Girls' Generation and of its sub-unit Girls' Generation-Oh!GG under the label SM Entertainment. ï¿¼She has white hair Category:1989 births Category:American radio personalities Category:Girls' Generation members Category:Living people Category:People from Orange, California Category:Singers from California Category:SM Entertainment artists Category:South Korean singers
